archimate:DataObject.name: Node-Specific Tombstone
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A Tombstone marked by an individual Steward so that it is no longer returned in response to a request for read access to the Node operated by that Steward. Mutually exclusive with Ledger-Wide Tombstone.
